name: weblast
description: WhatsApp blast server using Express, payloads from Apps Script, and Chrome 127 for Render

scripts.postinstall: node -e "require('@puppeteer/browsers').install({ browser: 'chrome', buildId: '127.0.6533.88', cacheDir: process.env.PUPPETEER_CACHE_DIR }).then(() => console.log('✅ Chrome installed')).catch(e => { console.error('❌ Chrome install failed', e.message); process.exit(1); });"
